text.text_translated: Wild animals sometimes come into cities to look for food. In Cape Town, South Africa, baboons are now coming into areas on the edge of the city to find food. Baboons are a type of wild animal. They open rubbish bins and eat fruit from gardens and orchards. Some baboons are not afraid. They even go into people's houses and take food from kitchen cupboards and fridges. Baboons can be dangerous. They are attacking pet animals. Because of this, many people in the city do not want the baboons there.
